item.title: Follow the leader. New research finds these politicians are the savviest stock pickers.
item.description: Follow the leader. New research shows one specific group of Congress members are savvy stock pickers.

item.title: ‘She’s young enough to be his granddaughter’: My dad, 85, is being seduced by his caregiver. What can I do?
item.description: “He is of sound mind, but he might succumb to someone who offers him companionship.”

item.title: ‘It’s expensive feeding and housing a family of 7’: I’m 41 with $46K in credit-card debt. Do I raid my $1.2 million IRAs?
item.description: “I bring in $7,200 a month from my pension and disability benefits.”

item.title: Bitcoin’s slumping again. The biggest corporate owner admits it may have to sell if things get worse.
item.description: Bitcoin sprinted higher over the holiday, but that’s now fading and bitcoin’s biggest corporate holder says they’d be forced to sell if things worsen.

item.title: Judge may force sale of Nicki Minaj’s $20 million SoCal mansion over debt owed to former security guard
item.description: A judge says she is close to forcing the sale of Nicki Minaj’s L.A. home after the rapper allegedly refused to pay damages awarded to a former securit...
